text: They went public with their romance in February. And things appear to be serious between Camila Cabello, 21, and her British beau Matthew Hussey, 31, as the couple stepped out with the singer's mom Sinuhe Estrabao on Tuesday. The duo coordinated in casual khaki green outfits as they strolled around the Venice Beach neighborhood of Los Angeles. Getting serious : Camila Cabello is pictured out in Venice Beach on Tuesday with boyfriend Matthew Hussey The former Fifth Harmony member sported a camouflage print T - shirt and sweatpants and wrapped a plaid shirt around her waist. The Havana hitmaker finished her off - duty look with some trendy small sunglasses. Her Essex - born beau wore a green T - shirt tucked into navy Nike shorts and covered his head with a baseball cap
